subject: commission payment request
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN support team
in the previous email you said that you would pay me the commission at the
beginning of the month and I still haven't received my payment.
I hope the support team will review and pay me soon so that I have more
resources to re-optimize my advertising campaign
I sincerely thank you
best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi THUMMO,    We are handling this matter and will issue your commission today. Please don't worry.
